entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 12:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: SE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except 9 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except 9 inland. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
